title: I am second in my class. How can I become first? - Quora

response.answer_text: The suggestion below will help you to become a good student: Attend class attentivelyPlan your scheduleNote-making will help u a lotHelp weak studentsTry to coordinate with your classmatesSolve more question papers for the topics which are taught to you in classUnderstand the concepts while studyingLearn and get information from the internet about the topics taught so that u can answer effectively.

I do not know what educational background you are from or what you are pursuing. But the answer to this question is common to all. Do not try to compete with others; rather compete with yourself. Try to improve yourself everyday. The position you stand at this moment, shall rise the next moment. So it hardly matters if you’re second or you come first in your class in the near future. What matters is how knowledgeable you’re and when the time comes how well you present yourselves. I hope these two lines written above, makes a difference in your life. Good Luck!
